title: Chicken chow mein noodles
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons toasted sesame seed oil', '3 tablespoons ground nut oil', '2 cloves garlic', '1 large chicken breast fillet, cut into strips', 'two nests medium egg noodles', '1 handful baby sweetcorn', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1/2 large red pepper, seeded and chopped', 'chopped mixed vegetables, of your choice', '1 tablespoon light soya sauce', '1 tablespoon dark soya sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1/2 teaspoon MSG (optional)']
